synopsis.text: Tsuna, a middle-schooler with a track record of mediocrity and social awkwardness, finds his mundane life taking a dramatic turn when he encounters Reborn, an enigmatic baby with a surprising profession - a hitman hailing from Italy's most powerful mafia family, the Vongola. Tasked with grooming Tsuna to succeed the retiring ninth boss of the Vongola family, Reborn embarks on a mission to transform the seemingly ordinary boy into a formidable mafia leader. With the help of his peculiar tutor and a motley crew of criminal associates, Tsuna must navigate the treacherous path towards greatness, all while nursing an unrequited crush on the school idol, Kyouko. As Tsuna grapples with his newfound destiny, he must overcome countless challenges and prove that even a 'loser' can rise to the top of the mafia world.
